00391 // Submit Button

00393 //Define the action buttons
00394 print "<div class='actionbutton'>" . LF;
00395 //IF ACTION IS ADD
00396 if ($action == "add")
00397         print "<input type='submit' name='push' value='Add Entry' class='submit'>" . LF;
00398 //IF ACTION IS loadTemp so we know it $_POST["is_user_res"] = 1
00399 if ($action == "loadTemp")
00400 {
00401         print "<input type='hidden' name='is_user_res' value='1'>" . LF ;
00402         print "<input type='submit' name='push' value='Add Entry' class='submit'>" . LF;
00403 }
00404 elseif($action == "loadOldObs")
00405 {
00406     print "<input type='hidden' name='is_old_res' value='1'>" . LF ;
00407     print "<input type='submit' name='push' value='Add Entry' class='submit'>" . LF;
00408 }
00409 //IF ACTION IS EDIT
00410 else if ($action == "edit")
00411         print "<input type='submit' name='push' value='Update Entry'>" . LF;
